title: The Krypton Factor
overview: The Krypton Factor will put a new generation of contestants through the mental and physical tests on Britain's toughest game show. In the original Krypton Factor contestants were tested on their memory, logic and general knowledge before facing the infamous army assault course with its dramatic rope swing finish. The assault course is back for the new series but will be more gruelling than ever before. Meanwhile, all the challenges have been updated using the latest state-of-the-art technology.
